22101008.text_cn: 早安！睡到自然醒的感觉真棒啊！
22101008.text_en: Good morning! It feels great to wake up naturally!
22101008.text_jp: 今日も一日頑張りましょう!

22101167.text_cn: 早安，引航者。哈...嗯？我，我才没有熬夜打游戏呢。
22101167.text_en: Good morning, Navigator. Ha... huh? I, I didn't stay up late playing games.

22101009.text_cn: 晚上好！终于可以放松一下了嘛！
22101009.text_en: Good evening! It's finally time to relax!
22101009.text_jp: あー、本官そろそろ日課に備えてご飯とか済ませちゃいたいですかねー。

22101168.text_cn: 要一起去吃饭吗？最近茶室的牛肉滑蛋饭很好吃哦。放心，我请客。
22101168.text_en: Would you like to go for a meal together? The beef and egg rice at the teahouse is delicious lately. Don't worry, I'll treat you.

22101010.text_cn: 如果你晚上熬夜不睡觉，早上会不会像我一样赖床啊？
22101010.text_en: If you stay up late at night, will you be sleepy in the morning like me?
22101010.text_jp: ああ、最高かよ、今日も神回やったわ。

22101169.text_cn: （咕咚，咕咚，咕咚，咕咚）啊！果然忙完一天，还是冰镇快乐水最能治愈心灵啊。
22101169.text_en: (Gulp, gulp, gulp, gulp) Ah! As expected, after a busy day, nothing heals the soul like an ice-cold bottle of Coca-Cola.

22101005.text_cn: （哼歌）又收到新邮件啦，我们快来看啊可能里面有什么吧。说不定，会有最新的动漫资讯呢！
22101005.text_en: (Humming) We've received new mail. Let's take a look and see what's inside. Who knows, there might be the latest anime information!

22101013.text_cn: 又到新的一年啦！我准备了好多糖果和猫爪小甜饼，等到放烟花的时候我们一起来享用吧！
22101013.text_en: It's a new year again! I've prepared lots of candies and little sweets. Let's enjoy them together when we set off the fireworks!
22101013.text_jp: 明けましておめでとうございます!一年の計は元旦にありです!良い一年にしましょうね!

22101014.text_cn: 新年好~~如果有坏蛋敢在这种时候捣乱，我米雪儿一定会好好惩罚他们的~
22101014.text_en: Happy New Year! If any villains dare to cause trouble at this time, I, Michele, will definitely punish them!
22101014.text_jp: 新年ハオー!さあ、バカ騒ぎしてる人がいないか見回りに行きましょう!

22101015.text_cn: 每年一到圣诞节，我就会开始期待下雪，期待圣诞老人放进袜子里的礼物。
22101015.text_en: Every year when Christmas comes, I start looking forward to the snow and the gifts that Santa Claus puts in the stockings.
22101015.text_jp: おー!リアルクリスマス会やー!すき焼きやろうぞ!すき焼きー!

22101016.text_cn: 今天是情人节吗？难怪街上的气氛这么浪漫呢。对啦，我拿到了一个粉红色的气球哦，等会就送给你吧~
22101016.text_en: Is today Valentine's day? No wonder the atmosphere on the street is so romantic! Oh, by the way, I got a pink balloon, I'll give it to you later~
22101016.text_jp: 今日はゔぁんあれんたい?のお誕生日ってなんかで言ってました。なんだっけな。

22101017.text_cn: 今天很特别哦。欸，你不知道吗？这是属于我们的卡拉彼丘纪念日呀！
22101017.text_en: Today is very special. Huh, don't you know? It's our Strinova anniversary!
22101017.text_jp: 今日は二次元記念日…じゃなかった!人類がカラビヤウに足を踏み入れた記念すべき日です!

22101065.text_cn: 今天，我想给你安排一个浪漫的行程哦，如果只是去吃美味的甜品逛一逛游乐园的话我总感觉会缺了点什么，对了，不如我们晚上一起去看灯会吧！
22101065.text_en: Today, I'd like to plan a romantic itinerary for you. I always feel like something is missing if we just go out for delicious desserts and a stroll in the amusement park. Oh, I know! Why don't we go to the lantern festival together in the evening!
22101065.text_jp: あー!やってもーたー!やってるときは気配を消してくださいって言ってるじゃないですか!ノーボム縛り全クリ!もう少しだったのに!間違ってボムちゃったじゃないですかー!!!

22101030.text_cn: 哇！我猜的没错！你果然取得胜利啦！
22101030.text_en: Wow! I guessed right! You won, as I expected!
22101030.text_jp: 本官やるときはやるんです!

22101222.text_cn: 锵锵，游戏胜利！这点难度怎么难得倒超级玩家呢。
22101222.text_en: Clang, clang, game won! This level of difficulty can't be too hard for a super player.

22101031.text_cn: 诶？在这个时候问我觉得谁最厉害？我肯定会说是你啊！
22101031.text_en: Huh? You're asking me who I think is the strongest at this time? I would definitely say it's you!
22101031.text_jp: 本官の実力?いやいやいやいや!皆さんのおかげですってば!

22101223.text_cn: 没有关系哦，我打游戏也会有卡关的时候，我陪你一起再挑战一次吧。
22101223.text_en: It's okay, I also get stuck sometimes when I play games. Let's challenge it again together.

22101032.text_jp: ガッバガバで草なんだが

22101224.text_cn: 白金奖杯是属于我们的啦，感觉和伙伴一起，什么样的难关都能攻克呢。
22101224.text_en: The Platinum Trophy is ours! It feels like we can overcome any obstacle when we work together as a team.

22101033.text_cn: 过来，听我说嘛，我才不管什么输赢呢，在我心里你已经很棒啦！
22101033.text_en: Come here, listen to me, I don't care about winning or losing, you are already amazing in my heart!
22101033.text_jp: こんなの気にしちゃダメですよ! 本官もっと頑張りますんで!

22101225.text_cn: 别太担心，我们肯定能赢回来，喝两杯快乐水精神一下吧。
22101225.text_en: Don't worry, we will definitely win this back. Let's cheer up with some Coca-Cola.

22101001.text_cn: 只有等到没有战斗的那一天，我才能尽情地玩游戏吧。
22101001.text_en: I guess I'll be able to play games to my heart's content only when the day comes that there is no more fighting.
22101001.text_jp: うっははは! くすぐったいです!

22101207.text_cn: 哎呀，手痒难耐，现在我们就来打一局游戏吧。
22101207.text_en: Oh, I'm so itchy to play a game right now. Let's get started!

22101002.text_cn: 有困难就找搜查官嘛，我做好了随时出动的准备哦。
22101002.text_en: Just call on Inspector if you have any trouble. I'm always ready for action.
22101002.text_jp: え?な、なにするんですか?

22101208.text_cn: 你问我是怎么把火力大喵举起来的吗？那孩子其实很轻哒。
22101208.text_en: Did you ask how I lifted Mighty Meowblast? That kid is actually very light.

22101003.text_cn: 我真正想要贯彻的正义是什么？这必然是一个需要思考很久的问题啦！
22101003.text_en: What is the justice that I truly want to uphold? This is definitely a question that requires a lot of thought!
22101003.text_jp: ん?手のひらに文字を書いて……伝言ゲームですか?

22101209.text_cn: 现在要玩？马上就好，等我把这十几页检讨写完。
22101209.text_en: Want to play now? Just a sec, let me finish writing this ten-something-page reflection first.

22101004.text_cn: 我不是小孩子啦！嘿嘿嘿（有点害羞的笑声）。
22101004.text_en: I'm not a kid anymore! Hehehe (giggling shyly).
22101004.text_jp: すぐ子ども扱いするんですから…フフフ…

22101210.text_cn: 哼哼，工作不玩耍，聪明杰克也变傻。
22101210.text_en: Hum, all work and no play makes Jack a dull boy.

22101059.text_cn: 说起来，你对猫猫的关注，似乎比我更多欸。最近猫猫也总是粘着你。糟糕，突然不知道该羡慕谁了。
22101059.text_en: Come to think of it, you seem to pay more attention to the cat than I do. Lately, she's been sticking to you a lot, too. Darn, I don't know who to be jealous of all of a sudden.
22101059.text_jp: イェイ!ハイタッチですね!

22101060.text_cn: 嗯？你又来找我玩了吗，我正准备再看一集动画呢。嗯，不过……先来陪你也是可以的啦！
22101060.text_en: Hmm? You're here to play with me again? I was just about to watch another episode of anime. But... I guess I can play with you first!
22101060.text_jp: 何事もないのが一番です

22101061.text_cn: 你是想让我放下游戏来跟你聊天吗？
22101061.text_en: Do you want me to put down my game and chat with you?
22101061.text_jp: もっと知りたいです、この世界のこと。二次元、最高!

22101062.text_cn: 对于你的事情我都很好奇呢！你就没有什么想要偷偷告诉我的吗？
22101062.text_en: I'm very curious about you! Don't you have anything you want to tell me in secret?
22101062.text_jp: ねえねえ、今度一緒に詰んでるアニメ見ましょうよ

22101211.text_cn: 伙伴，那个，今天咱们玩一点平时我不太敢玩的恐怖游戏吧。
22101211.text_en: Partner, let's play some horror games that I usually don't dare to play today.

22101063.text_cn: 我知道，爸爸的记忆可能很难再恢复了，一开始我确实很沮丧啦，但是后来我也渐渐接受事实了，毕竟失去了过去并不代表没有未来，对吧？
22101063.text_en: I know it might be difficult to restore Dad's memory, and I was quite discouraged at first. But later, I gradually accepted the fact. After all, losing the past doesn't mean there's no future, right?
22101063.text_jp: もう、また本官のところに来たんですか?しょうがないですね

22101025.__title_hint: 好感度上升后触碰/Touching (high favorability)
22101025.text_cn: 嗯...你是在我手上写了什么字吗？这是什么文字游戏吗？
22101025.text_en: What...did you write something on my hand? Is this some kind of word game?

22101212.__title_hint: 好感度上升后触碰/Touching (high favorability)
22101212.text_cn: 之前回来的时候，我顺路买了一些小零食，一起来尝尝吧，对于恢复元气很有帮助哦。
22101212.text_en: When I came back earlier, I picked up some snacks. Let's try them together. They're great for replenishing energy!

22101026.__title_hint: 好感度上升后触碰/Touching (high favorability)
22101026.text_cn: 我相信，只要维护好卡丘世界的秩序，就能让大家过上幸福的生活。
22101026.text_en: I believe that as long as we uphold order in Strinova, everyone can live a happy life.

22101213.__title_hint: 好感度上升后触碰/Touching (high favorability)
22101213.text_cn: 有了你的提醒之后，我最近写检讨的数量都奇迹般地减少了。
22101213.text_en: Since you reminded me, the number of self-reflections I've written recently has miraculously decreased.

22101027.__title_hint: 好感度上升后触碰/Touching (high favorability)
22101027.text_cn: 就算剪刀手真有他们不得不反抗的理由，也不能用这么极端的手段嘛，反正，我是没办法理解的了。
22101027.text_en: Even if The Scissors had reasons that compelled them to rebel, they shouldn't have resorted to such extreme measures. Anyway, I can't understand it.
22101027.text_jp: はい、必ず勝ってきます!

22101214.__title_hint: 好感度上升后触碰/Touching (high favorability)
22101214.text_cn: 游戏论坛近期有个同人文征集活动，我想把我们两个人的故事写上去，应该会很有趣。
22101214.text_en: There is a fanfiction contest on the gaming forum recently, and I think it would be fun to write our story and submit it.

22101028.__title_hint: 好感度上升后触碰/Touching (high favorability)
22101028.text_cn: 不在逆境中轻言退缩，我一定要积攒起足够的勇气和决心才行呢！
22101028.text_en: I must not retreat in the face of adversity, I have to gather enough courage and determination!
22101028.text_jp: うふふ、心配性なんですから。

22101215.__title_hint: 好感度上升后触碰/Touching (high favorability)
22101215.text_cn: 让我数一数，我们一共解锁了多少奖杯？哇，都这么多了，不愧是我们！
22101215.text_en: Let me count how many trophies we have unlocked. Wow, we have achieved so much!

22101029.__title_hint: 好感度上升后触碰/Touching (high favorability)
22101029.text_cn: 既然这一次我都替你欢呼了，那么今后你人生中的每一个重要时刻都让我来陪着你吧！
22101029.text_en: Since I cheered for you this time, let me accompany you in every important moment in your life from now on!
22101029.text_jp: んっ もう仕方のない人ですね、少しだけですよ

22101035.text_cn: 来和我一起做个约定吧！无论这个世界变成什么样子，我们都不要分开哦！
22101035.text_en: Let's make a promise together! No matter what this world becomes, let's never part!
22101035.text_jp: ゲームが好きかですか?はい!好きですよ!特にシューティングゲームは大好きです!

22101217.text_cn: 爸爸病倒了以后，好久没有人陪我一起玩了。哼哼，还好我遇见了你，终于不再是一个人了。
22101217.text_en: Dad fell ill and I haven't had anyone to play with for a long time. Thankfully I met you, so I'm not alone anymore.

22101036.text_cn: 我从来都不觉得天真是件坏事，因为在那些不切实际梦想背后，就藏着大家想要过得真正的人生。
22101036.text_en: I never thought naivety was a bad thing, because behind those unrealistic dreams lies the life that people truly yearn for.
22101036.text_jp: 今ハマってるゲーム、2人で協力しないと倒せないボスがいるんですよねぇ。今晩手伝ってくれないかなぁ。

22101218.text_cn: 等爸爸醒了，我绝对要把你介绍给他，这样就能多一个开黑的人。
22101218.text_en: When Dad wakes up, I'll definitely introduce you to him so that we'll have one more person to game with.

22101037.text_cn: 正义是一种信念，我理想中的搜查官应该要有拯救世界的觉悟，可是，究竟还要多久我才能成为那样的人呢。
22101037.text_en: Justice is a belief, and an ideal Inspector in my mind should have the determination to save the world. But how much longer will it take for me to become that kind of person?
22101037.text_jp: なんで本官よりウチの猫と仲良さそうなんですかーうー、スリスリして気持ちよさそう、ちょっと羨ましいかも。どっちが羨ましいかは言えないけど

22101219.text_cn: 大家说有时候我不太靠谱，但是有你一起的话，我就觉得我不会失败。不，是一定不会失败。
22101219.text_en: Everyone says that I'm not very reliable sometimes, but when I'm with you, I feel like I won't fail. No, I surely will not fail.

22101038.text_cn: 我总觉得自己应该会有些特殊的使命，就像是治愈崩溃症啊、击退剪刀手什么的！啊？我没在开玩笑！我是认真的哦！
22101038.text_en: I always feel that I should have some special mission, like curing Collapse Syndrome... or defeating the Scissors! What? I'm not joking! I'm serious!
22101038.text_jp: 次の週末、今遊んでるゲームが限定アイテムドロップイベやるんです。うちで一緒に手伝ってくださいよ!あっ、違う違う!うちじゃなくって、カフェでやりましょう!カフェで!

22101220.text_cn: 耶，能和你一起开黑真是太痛快了，要是可以的话，我希望是一辈子都和你开黑。
22101220.text_en: Yeah, it's so fun to game with you. If possible, I'd like to game with you for life.

22101039.text_cn: 欢迎回家，欸，好像不太对。欢迎你的到来！嘿，可爱吧？
22101039.text_en: Welcome home, oops, that doesn't seem right. Welcome here! Hehe, it's cute, isn't it?
22101039.text_jp: ルールを守らない人たちって、本当何考えてるんですかね?

22101179.text_cn: 看看是谁来啦？原来是我最好的伙伴呐。来，一起和猫猫玩一会儿吧。
22101179.text_en: Look who's here! It's my best partner. Come, let's play with the cat for a while.

22101040.text_cn: 我追的新番好像就要更新了，我得快点吃完饭，等会就能去看啦。
22101040.text_en: The new anime series I'm following is about to be released with a new episode, so I need to hurry up and finish my dinner so I can watch it soon.
22101040.text_jp: ノブナガ先輩ってとっても頼もしい人なんですけど、なんか微妙に危なっかしいんですよねー。本官たちが見てないところで早まったことしてないといいんですけど

22101183.text_cn: 诶，最新一集的纸飞机侦探已经更新了，快快，好吃不等人呐。
22101183.text_en: Hey, the latest episode of Paper Plane Detective is out. Quick, let's watch it before it gets cold.

22101041.text_cn: 你是来陪我玩游戏的嘛？我正好缺少高手的指点呢！
22101041.text_en: Are you here to play games with me? I could really use a pro's guidance!
22101041.text_jp: シザースのラヴィーネ…何度か目にしたことがありますが、ただものじゃないと思っています。個人的にはですけど、ミンの下についてるの違和感なんですよね。

22101187.text_cn: 啊，伙伴你终于来了，这一局我卡关好久了，咱们一起来研究研究怎么过关吧。
22101187.text_en: Oh, partner, you're finally here. I've been stuck on this level for so long. Let's figure out how to get past it together.

22101042.text_cn: 嗯？我没有在偷懒哦，这是难得的休息时间啦。
22101042.text_en: Hmm? I'm not slacking off, this is a well-deserved break.

22101191.text_cn: （梦话）好想要一只万能的大喵啊！啊？你什么时候来的。难道，你有任意门吗？
22101191.text_en: (Mumbling in sleep) I really want an omnipotent Meowblast! Huh? When did you come? Do you, by any chance, have a magic door?

22101043.text_cn: 感谢你平时对我的照顾，我给你准备了一个小惊喜，就作为我们的纪念礼物吧！
22101043.text_en: Thank you for taking care of me all this time. I've prepared a little surprise for you, as a memento of our time together!
22101043.text_jp: シザースのリーダー、ミン。カラビヤウに危険をもたらす思想の持ち主で、鎮圧すべき筆頭の人物です。あと、本官のこと、犬って言うんですよ!本官猫派なのに!

22101023.text_cn: 真是有点不可思议，我才刚刚想到你，你就立马出现啦！
22101023.text_en: It's really quite unbelievable! I just thought of you, and here you are!
22101023.text_jp: 今日も元気に出勤です!

22101044.text_cn: 只要我待在家里，猫猫好像就会变得特别活泼呢。
22101044.text_en: My cat always becomes very active when I stay at home.
22101044.text_jp: ふっははは!かわいい!永遠にモフッていたい!

22101180.text_cn: 伙伴，给你看看喵喵卫士的特训成果，她好像能跳得更高了。
22101180.text_en: Partner, take a look at Pawtector's special training results. She seems to be able to jump higher.

22101045.text_cn: 哇——这集动画简直太精彩啦！
22101045.text_en: Wow, this episode of the anime was amazing!
22101045.text_jp: はぁ…7000万回は読んだのに、読むたび新たな良さがある…アニメ化したら死ぬ!

22101184.text_cn: 精彩啊，无可挑剔的名推理。哎，等等，好像没太吃饱。
22101184.text_en: Wonderful, impeccable reasoning. Now that I think about it, I don't feel like I've eaten enough.

22101046.text_cn: 这个BOSS也太难了吧！我都打了好几遍还没有通关，希望这次可以。
22101046.text_en: This boss is too difficult! I've tried so many times and still haven't beaten it. Hope I can make it this time.
22101046.text_jp: 早くスピーカー直さなければ、推しが!推しが始まってしまう!

22101188.text_cn: 还是来查查攻略好了，上上下下，左右左。嗯？等等，是什么来着？下上下，右左右？
22101188.text_en: Let's check the walkthrough, up, up, down, down, left, right, left. Hmm? Wait, what was it? Down, up, down, right, left, right?

22101047.text_cn: 啊~像这样躺着吃零食，还真是舒服呀~
22101047.text_en: Ah~ It's so comfortable to lie down and eat snacks like this.
22101047.text_jp: ゲーム化したって聞いた時は恐怖しかなかったけど、よくできてるンゴねぇ

22101192.text_cn: 好神奇啊，要不要拜托心夏前辈给大喵安装一个竹蜻蜓呢？对抓捕罪犯很有帮助吧。
22101192.text_en: How amazing! Should we ask Kokona Senpai to install a bamboo dragonfly for Meowblast? It would be very helpful for catching criminals.

22101048.text_cn: 话说你平时休息的时候会做些什么呢？我们之间应该有很多相似之处吧。
22101048.text_en: Well, what do you do in your free time? I bet we have a lot in common.
22101048.text_jp: ふん…東は本官が並ぶ…西のグッズを頼む…

22101049.text_cn: 嗯？你也忍不住想要逗逗它吗？那你来吧。
22101049.text_en: Hmm? You want to play with it, too? Go ahead.
22101049.text_jp: ふぃひっひっひっひっひっひっひっひっ

22101050.text_cn: 哎呀，别闹了啦！你难道不想知道我在看什么嘛？
22101050.text_en: Oh, stop it! Don't you want to know what I'm watching?
22101050.text_jp: ウフフフフッ、この二人、永遠にいちゃついててくれぇ!頼む!

22101051.text_cn: 啊！等一下！我再玩一局，就一局，马上就能赢啦！
22101051.text_en: Ah! Wait a second! Just one more game, I'm about to win!

22101052.text_cn: 这是家里最后一包零食啦！你可不要全都吃完哦！
22101052.text_en: This is the last bag of snacks at home! Don't eat it all!
22101052.text_jp: お帰りなさい!じゃあなかった…いらっしゃいです

22101053.text_cn: 我也该起来活动一下啦！虽然还是有那么一点困困的。
22101053.text_en: I should probably get up and move around, too! Although I'm still a little bit sleepy.
22101053.text_jp: あ、あ、寝てません。イメージトレーニングです。

22101054.text_cn: 喵~我的衣服是不是也挺可爱的！
22101054.text_en: Meow~ Aren't my clothes cute too!
22101054.text_jp: 見てくださいこのカチューシャ!猫耳なんですよ!かわいいと思いません?

22101055.text_cn: 最近艾顿城正在举行漫展，如果你有空的话，要不要陪我一起去呀，我有好多想买的周边呢！
22101055.text_en: There's a comic convention happening in Arton City right now. Want to come with me if you're free? I have a lot of merchandise I want to buy!
22101055.text_jp: 今日も見回り、異常ありませんでした!

22101058.__title_hint: 近景交谈/Close up easter egg
22101058.text_cn: 对了，最近刚推出了一款双人游戏，我很想和你一起玩呢！
22101058.text_en: By the way, a new two-player game just came out that I really want to play with you!
22101058.text_jp: はっはっ!こ、ここれはいわゆるガチ恋距離ーというやつなのでは?

22101064.text_cn: 嗯~~我突然也好想躺在地上来回打滚啦！
22101064.text_en: Hmm, I suddenly feel like rolling around on the ground, too!
22101064.text_jp: くっ!高まる!あ、いいところに!今前から気になってた例のゲームのPV発表があったんです!一緒に予約してアーリープレイしますからね!

22101024.text_cn: 哇！太谢谢你啦！我一直以来都很想收到这样的礼物！所以，你算是满足了我的心愿哦~
22101024.text_en: Wow! Thank you so much! I've always wanted to receive a gift like this! So, you've granted my wish~
22101024.text_jp: 猫とゲーム選ぶならどっちですか?ううううう、そんなの選べませんよー!

22101056.__title_hint: 感谢礼物/Thanking a gift (close up)
22101056.text_cn: 每次收到你的礼物我都会特别开心呢！
22101056.text_en: I'm always especially happy when I receive gifts from you!
22101056.text_jp: いつもありがとうございますえっと…もうちょっと近くに来てもいいんです…けど…

22101057.__title_hint: 感谢专属礼物/Thanking a special gift
22101057.text_cn: 原来……你这么了解我，其实我没有想到自己能收到这么独一无二的礼物，真是谢谢你啦！
22101057.text_en: So... you know me so well. I never expected to receive such a unique gift. Thank you so much!
22101057.text_jp: いやあのー、ずっと一緒にいてくれると嬉しいなー、なんて

22101197.text_cn: 伙伴，今天我被一个叫做星之少女的家伙给打惨了，一局游戏都没有赢过，现在你能陪我放松会儿吗？
22101197.text_en: Partner, I got crushed by someone called Star Girl today. I didn't win a single game. Can you keep me company now to relax?

22101198.text_cn: 啊？新搜查官故事出新作了吗？好哎！我正好想和你一起玩呢。
22101198.text_en: The new Inspector game just released? Yay! I happen to want to play it with you.

22101204.text_cn: 正义是要通过一点一滴实现的。伙伴，让我们继续努力吧！
22101204.text_en: Justice is achieved little by little. Partner, let's keep up the effort!

22101205.text_cn: 再做这样的事情的话，你就不是我的伙伴了。快回头吧。
22101205.text_en: If you do that again, you won't be my partner anymore. Desist now.

22101206.text_cn: 这种事情就交给我们搜查官吧，坏人是不会被放过的。相信我，伙伴。
22101206.text_en: Leave this to us Inspectors; the bad guys will never get away. Trust me, partner.

22101216.text_cn: 嗯？为什么突然摸我的头啊？我知道了，是不是觉得我比之前更加可靠了？
22101216.text_en: Hmm? Why are you suddenly patting my head? I know, do you think I'm more reliable than before?

22101221.text_cn: 嘿嘿，我刚刚在想，要是我变成猫，肯定要赖着你一辈子的。
22101221.text_en: Hehe, I was just thinking that if I were a cat, I'd definitely cling to you for life.

22101226.text_cn: 要想让火力大喵受欢迎，真的好难啊，那孩子不太能控制得住自己的火力。
22101226.text_en: It's really hard to make Mighty Meowblast popular. That child can't quite control her power.

22101227.text_cn: 比起没完没了的雨天，我还是更喜欢晴天一些，每当太阳升起的时候，我的元气就能自动充满了。
22101227.text_en: I prefer sunny days to endless rainy days. My energy levels automatically recharge whenever the sun rises.

22101228.text_cn: 厨艺？呃，那个我也是会一点的，比如蛋炒饭，葱花炒饭之类的。你那是什么眼神啊，喂……
22101228.text_en: Cooking? Well, I know a little bit, like how to make fried rice with eggs and scallions. What are you looking at me like that for, hey...

22101229.text_cn: 大喵她这次又立了大功，为了奖励她，我决定带她去心夏前辈那里做一番保养，可她好像不是很乐意。
22101229.text_en: The Mighty Meowblast has done a great job again. As a reward, I decided to take her to Kokona Senpai's place for maintenance, but she didn't seem very happy about it.

22101230.text_cn: 要是有天，我成了队长会是什么样子呢？我觉得，自己应该比信队长可靠，比心夏前辈还温柔。笑什么吗？什么想象不出来？一定是那样子的！
22101230.text_en: What would it be like if I were to become a captain one day? I think I would be more reliable than Captain Nobunaga and gentler than Kokona Senpai. Why are you laughing? You can't imagine it? It will definitely be like that!

22101231.text_cn: 爸爸他是在一次作战行动中倒下的，没有人知道发生了什么，我一定会查出真相的。
22101231.text_en: My father fell during a combat operation, and no one knows what happened. I will definitely get to the bottom of this and find out the truth.

22101011.text_cn: 祝你生日快乐！等会吹蜡烛的时候，你记得要许三个生日愿望哦！
22101011.text_en: Happy birthday! Remember to make three wishes when you blow out the candles later!
22101011.text_jp: お誕生日おめでとうございます!あなたにとって素敵な一年になりますように!

22101172.text_cn: 今天是你的生日，我一直记着呢。我们今天一起去游戏厅玩上一整天吧，只有我们两个。
22101172.text_en: Today is your birthday, and I've always remembered it. Let's go to the arcade together and spend the whole day there, just the two of us.

22101034.text_cn: 生日快乐！我早就为你的生日做好庆祝的准备啦，蛋糕、彩带和礼物一个都不会少哦，快过来迎接惊喜吧！
22101034.text_en: Happy birthday! I've been looking forward to celebrating your birthday and have prepared cake, ribbons, and gifts for you. Come and get your surprises!
22101034.text_jp: お誕生日おめでとうございます!これからもよろしくお願いしますね!

22101012.text_cn: 嘿嘿，没错！今天是我的生日！我打算请大家一起来吃奶油蛋糕，你可千万不要缺席哦！
22101012.text_en: Hehe, that's right! Today is my birthday! I'm planning to treat everyone to some cream cake, so you'd better not be absent!
22101012.text_jp: 本官の誕生日覚えててくれたんですか?えっ?プレゼントですか?後で欲しいものリスト送っていいですか!

22101171.text_cn: 哼，我收到了伙伴的生日祝福啦。说起来，你的生日是哪天啊？下次换我来给你庆祝。
22101171.text_en: Hmm, I received birthday wishes from my partner. By the way, when is your birthday? Next time it's my turn to celebrate with you.

22101700.text_cn: 哇！这是给我准备的吗？今天一整天我都在忙着写检讨，没想到伙伴还记得我的生日，真是太感动了！谢谢你，伙伴！
22101700.text_en: Wow! Is this for me? I've been busy writing self-criticisms all day today, and I didn't expect my partner to remember my birthday. I'm so touched! Thank you, partner!

22101701.text_cn: 哇，好可爱的蛋糕啊，接下来该许个什么愿望呢？嗯，是这样还是……哎，伙伴，你靠得好近啊，还不能告诉你，说出来就不灵了。
22101701.text_en: Wow, what a cute cake! I wonder what wish I should make next? Hmm, should I go with this one or... Hey, partner, you're standing too close. I can't tell you yet, the wish won't come true if I say it out loud.

22101702.text_cn: 哼哼，其实我也给你准备了一点点惊喜，作为我们共同冒险的见证。未来，还有许多的奖杯和宝箱在向我们招手呢，伙伴。
22101702.text_en: Hehe, I've also prepared a little surprise for you as a memento of our adventures together. In the future, there are many more trophies and treasures awaiting us, partner.

22101703.__title_hint: 讨论生日礼物/Discussing birthday gift
22101703.text_cn: 啊？你是说今天的生日活动还有隐藏奖励？难道是…是我期待已久的？
22101703.text_en: Did you say that today's birthday event has a hidden reward? Could it be... the one I've been waiting for?

22101704.__title_hint: 收到生日礼物/Receiving birthday gift
22101704.text_cn: 谢谢你的礼物，伙伴，今年的生日能和伙伴一起度过，我很开心哦，我不会忘记这一天的！
22101704.text_en: Thank you for the gift, partner. I'm very happy that I was able to spend my birthday with you this year, and I will never forget this day!

22101705.text_cn: 这个，这个我真的可以收下吗？对别人来说可能是一般品质，但对我来说绝对是超稀有的宝物，能有你这样的伙伴，真是太好了！
22101705.text_en: This... can I really accept this? What may be of ordinary quality to others is an ultra-rare treasure to me. It's great to have a partner like you!

22101006.text_cn: 今天是不是伊薇特的生日啊？我得赶快为她准备一份礼物，像她那种可爱的女孩子，应该会喜欢软乎乎的东西吧！
22101006.text_en: Is today Yvette's birthday? I need to hurry and prepare a gift for her. A cute girl like her will probably like soft things.
22101006.text_jp: お友達にプレゼント…ですか…とりあえず、自分の推しグッズを押し付けるのはやめましょう。

22101007.text_cn: 我给心夏准备了一个生日惊喜，一定会让她觉得今年的生日特别难忘！
22101007.text_en: I've prepared a birthday surprise for Kokona that will make this year's birthday especially unforgettable for her!
22101007.text_jp: あれ?今日ってお友達の誕生日じゃないですか?ですよね!

22101066.text_jp: 本官にお任せください!

22101232.text_cn: 这种游戏模式平时可是很少见呢。
22101232.text_en: This game mode is rarely seen normally.

22101236.text_cn: 代号猎虎，特务调查官米雪儿，随时待命。
22101236.text_en: Code name Tiger, Special Agent Investigator Michele, ready at all times.

22101067.text_cn: 卡丘世界的秩序，由我来维护！
22101067.text_en: I will uphold the order of Strinova!

22101339.text_en: Michele the Hero, ready to strike!

22101068.text_jp: M4A1カービン安全装置解除しました!

22101233.text_cn: 游戏时间到了，一起来冒险吧！
22101233.text_en: It's time to play the game. Let's go on an adventure together!

22101069.text_cn: 一起努力吧，正义永不缺席！
22101069.text_en: Let us work together. Justice will never be denied!
22101069.text_jp: がんばりましょう!みなさん!

22101239.text_en: Fear the roar of the tiger...!

22101341.text_cn: 不知道能不能顺手开几个宝箱呢？
22101341.text_en: I wonder if we can open a few treasure chests along the way?

22101240.text_cn: 进入作战现场，让我们夺得胜利吧！
22101240.text_en: Let's enter the battlefield and secure victory!

22101342.text_cn: 勇者的小队，在此集合，出发！
22101342.text_en: The hero's squad, assemble here and let's go!

22101071.__title_hint: Q技能冷却完毕/Active skill cooldown complete
22101071.text_jp: 猫さん砲、使用可能です!

22101250.__title_hint: Q技能冷却完毕/Active skill cooldown complete
22101250.text_cn: 准备好出击了么，小家伙们！
22101250.text_en: Are you ready to attack, little ones?

22101251.text_cn: 准备埋伏，给他们一个惊喜。
22101251.text_en: Prepare an ambush and give them a surprise.

22101073.text_cn: 这一次，轮到我来保护大家了！
22101073.text_en: It's my turn to protect everyone!
22101073.text_jp: 敵、移動速度を低下させます！

22101252.text_cn: 发现敌情要记得汇报哦。
22101252.text_en: Remember to report any enemy activity.

22101074.text_jp: 小型狙撃砲台、設置しました!

22101253.text_cn: 哨卫布置完毕，坐等上钩……！
22101253.text_en: The sentries are in place, now we wait for the target to take the bait...!

22101075.text_jp: 索敵ジャミング、発動です!

22101254.text_cn: 标记猎物，你逃不掉的，小绵羊。
22101254.text_en: Marking my prey. You can't escape, little sheep.

22101076.text_jp: ガンドローン、撃てます!

22101255.text_cn: 白虎正渴望着大闹一番呢！
22101255.text_en: The White Tiger is longing to wreak some havoc!

22101077.text_jp: ドローンさん、やっちゃってください!

22101078.text_cn: 火力大喵是不会饶恕你们的！
22101078.text_en: Mighty Meow will not forgive you!

22101079.text_jp: ガンドローン、設置しました!

22101258.text_cn: 轮到我们来拯救世界了！
22101258.text_en: It's our turn to save the world!

22101111.text_cn: 毕竟我们的立场不同呢……
22101111.text_en: After all, we are on opposite sides...
22101111.text_jp: 良いイラストだったのに

22101297.text_en: It doesn't even count as a warm-up.

22101299.text_en: You can't escape the pursuit of the tiger's claws.

22101300.text_cn: 再来更多的猎物，让我过过瘾吧！
22101300.text_en: More prey, let me have some fun!

22101115.text_en: Two is not a problem, either!

22101301.text_cn: 狩猎开始了，快点跑起来吧？
22101301.text_en: The hunt has begun. Run for it!

22101302.text_en: Can't keep running? What a shame.

22101117.text_en: Look how I destroy all of you!

22101303.text_cn: 闭眼了可就再也睁不开了哦。
22101303.text_en: Once you close your eyes, you won't be able to open them again.

22101118.text_en: Justice will be served, no matter what!
22101118.text_jp: これが本官のM4A1カービンです!

22101304.text_cn: 这枪声就是正义在咆哮！
22101304.text_en: That gunfire is the roar of justice!

22101119.text_cn: 我在卡丘世界大展身手啦！
22101119.text_en: I'm showcasing my skills in the world of Strinova!

22101305.text_cn: 我会用正义的虎爪撕碎一切！
22101305.text_en: I will tear everything to shreds with my righteous tiger claws!

22101306.text_cn: 笑到最后的，只会是最顽强的那个人！
22101306.text_en: Only the toughest will be the one standing in the end!

22101309.text_en: I was the prey all along.

22101124.__title_hint: 危险区域死亡/Dying outside the zone
22101124.text_jp: 間に合わなかったです

22101310.__title_hint: 危险区域死亡/Dying outside the zone
22101310.text_cn: 不小心落入了敌人的陷阱。
22101310.text_en: I fell into the enemy's trap by accident.

22101125.text_jp: はあああああああああ

22101311.text_cn: 我还没来得及查清真相。
22101311.text_en: I didn't have time to find out the truth.

22101126.text_jp: そのまま寝ててください!

22101127.text_jp: ダウンしてしまいましたー!

22101122.__title_hint: 倒地时间结束后死亡/Dying after being downed
22101122.text_en: Why isn't anyone coming to help me...
22101122.text_jp: なんで助けてくれないんですかー!

22101308.__title_hint: 倒地时间结束后死亡/Dying after being downed

22101121.text_en: Ugh... I'm done for, I think.

22101128.text_cn: 呜呜……有人嘛，谁来帮帮我呀——
22101128.text_en: (weeping) Is anyone there? Can anyone help me?

22101315.text_cn: 发现伤员，即刻实施救援。
22101315.text_en: Found an injured personnel. Proceeding with rescue operations now.

22101130.text_jp: ありがとうございます!

22101316.text_cn: 多谢了，让我们继续狩猎吧。
22101316.text_en: Thank you, let's continue the hunt.

22101134.text_en: I'll leave the bomb here first.

22101135.__title_hint: 发现已被安装的炸弹/Seeing a planted bomb
22101135.text_en: The bomb is here! Come, everyone!

22101261.__title_hint: 发现已被安装的炸弹/Seeing a planted bomb
22101261.text_cn: 报告，在这里发现了炸弹。
22101261.text_en: Report, a bomb has been found here.

22101293.text_cn: 飞行是更高效的作战方式。
22101293.text_en: Flying is a more efficient tactic

22101137.text_en: Damn it... I shouldn't have lost!

22101165.text_en: There must be a mistake somewhere.

22101244.text_cn: 骄兵必败，他们不会一直赢下去的。
22101244.text_en: Pride goes before destruction, and a haughty spirit before a fall. They won't keep winning forever.

22101245.text_cn: 暂时放你们一马，瞧好了，猎虎还将再度出击。
22101245.text_en: I'll let you off the hook for now. Watch out, Tiger will strike again.

22101246.text_cn: 发生了预料之外的状况。猎虎小队请求撤离。
22101246.text_en: An unexpected situation has occurred. Team Tiger requests evacuation.

22101346.text_cn: 早知道应该提前查好攻略的。
22101346.text_en: I should have looked up the walkthrough beforehand.

22101347.text_cn: 这一局不算，我们，我们再来一局。
22101347.text_en: This round doesn't count. Let's play another round.

22101348.text_cn: 就当是提升一下经验值了。
22101348.text_en: At least we gained some experience.

22101163.text_en: It's not difficult for me at all.

22101234.text_cn: 胜利通关！我还没过瘾呢。

22101241.text_cn: 猎虎的狩猎到此为止。小绵羊们，见识到我的厉害了吗？
22101241.text_en: The Tiger's hunt is over. Little Sheep, have you seen my prowess?

22101242.text_cn: 今天的猎物不过如此，好没意思，“猎虎”还完全没有闹够呢！
22101242.text_en: Today's prey is so boring, it's not fun at all. Tiger is not satisfied at all!

22101243.text_cn: 这么快就投降了。猎虎才刚刚热完身呢。
22101243.text_en: Giving up so soon? Tiger has just warmed up.

22101344.text_cn: 这次的关卡只有这点难度啊。

22101345.text_cn: 胜利与宝箱都是属于我们的了。
22101345.text_en: Victory and treasures are both ours.

22101139.text_cn: 如果我能再努力一点的话……
22101139.text_en: If only I fought a bit harder...
22101139.text_jp: 本官がもっと頑張っていれば…

22101247.text_cn: 没有时间懊悔了，我们需要重整态势，伙伴。
22101247.text_en: No time for regrets, partner. We need to regroup.

22101349.text_cn: 刚才的对局只是演习罢了。下次的赢家一定是我。
22101349.text_en: That game was just a practice run. I will be the winner next time.

22101140.text_cn: 哼哼，果然我还是能做到的嘛！
22101140.text_en: Humph. I knew I could do it!
22101140.text_jp: ワイ本官、できる子やった!

22101166.text_cn: 这可是属于我们的胜利哦。

22101235.text_cn: 打破记录，我们真是最佳搭档啊。
22101235.text_en: We broke the record! We really are the best partners.

22101248.text_cn: 你们已经被我一个人包围了，速速投降吧！
22101248.text_en: I have single-handily surrounded you. surrender now!

22101249.text_cn: 我可是不会手下留情的。

22101351.text_cn: 很好，伙伴们，以不败的姿态迎接更多对局吧！
22101351.text_en: Great! Let's keep up our undefeated streak in more games, partners!

22101141.text_jp: さすがノブナガ先輩です!

22101321.title_en: Kokona is defusing the bomb (legendary skin)

22101142.text_en: I'll help you right now, Nobunaga Senpai!
22101142.text_jp: 助かります!ノブナガ先輩!

22101322.text_en: The Tiger's roar reverberates in all directions!

22101323.title_en: A teammate defused the bomb (legendary skin)
22101323.text_cn: 炸弹已拆除，小心，猎物们要过来反扑了。
22101323.text_en: The bomb has been defused. Be careful, the prey are coming back to strike.

22101324.text_cn: 来吧，小绵羊们，猎虎将狩猎到最后一刻。
22101324.text_en: Come on, little sheep, the Tiger will hunt till the last moment.

22101145.title_en: Score is behind the enemy team by a wide margin
22101145.text_cn: 先不要放弃呀，我们还有机会的！
22101145.text_en: Don't give up yet, we still have a chance!
22101145.text_jp: 諦めちゃダメです! 勝機は必ずあります!

22101325.text_cn: 调整作战方案，胜利一定是属于我们的。
22101325.text_en: Let's adjust our strategy and victory will surely be ours.

22101146.text_cn: 剪刀手的明……哼，等你很久了，做好觉悟吧！
22101146.text_en: The Scissors' Ming... Hmph, I've been waiting for you for a long time. Prepare yourself!
22101146.text_jp: シザースのミン、あなたを獲捕します!

22101326.text_cn: 要比掠食的话，果然还是老虎会略胜一筹呢。
22101326.text_en: When it comes to predation, tigers still have the upper hand.

22101327.text_cn: 我已经不是以前的我了。
22101327.text_en: I am not who I used to be.

22101147.text_cn: 明，我一定，一定不会原谅你！
22101147.text_en: Ming, I will definitely, definitely not forgive you!
22101147.text_jp: ミン!あなただけは絶対許さない!

22101328.text_cn: 艾卡……原本我们是可以做朋友的吧？
22101328.text_en: Eika... we could have been friends, couldn't we?

22101148.text_cn: 可恶！我竟然会被你这家伙干掉！
22101148.text_en: Damn! I can't believe I got taken out by you, of all people!
22101148.text_jp: 本官は犬じゃない!必ずあなたを捕まえますよ!

22101317.text_cn: 你的道路，绝对是，错误的。

22101329.text_cn: 星绘小姐，遇到危险的时候就呼叫搜查官吧。
22101329.text_en: Miss Celestia, call for Inspector when you are in danger.

22101149.text_cn: 拉薇……曾经身为欧泊成员的你，为什么会……
22101149.text_en: Lawine... Why would you, a former member of PUS, do something like this...
22101149.text_jp: ラヴィーネさん…PUSだったあなたが、なぜ!?

22101330.text_cn: 队长，继续与我并肩战斗吧。
22101330.text_en: Captain, continue to fight by my side.

22101318.text_cn: 报告队长，险情排除，马上实施救援！
22101318.text_en: Reporting to the captain, the danger has been removed, and the rescue will be carried out immediately!

22101319.text_cn: 心夏前辈，关键时刻我还是靠得住的。
22101319.text_en: Kokona Senpei, you can count on me at critical moments like this.

22101320.text_cn: 别乱动，我不会弄疼你的。
22101320.text_en: Don't move, I won't hurt you.

22101502.__title_hint: 远处有敌人/Enemy spotted far away
22101502.text_en: Report, enemy spotted in the distance.

22101503.__title_hint: 远处有敌人/Enemy spotted far away
22101503.text_en: Be careful, there are enemies in the distance.

22101504.__title_hint: 近处有敌人/Enemy spotted close by

22101505.__title_hint: 近处有敌人/Enemy spotted close by

22101506.text_cn: 多名敌人正在靠近，大家小心！
22101506.text_en: Multiple enemies are approaching, everyone be careful!

22101510.text_cn: 打中了！我的枪法还不赖吧？
22101510.text_en: Hit! My marksmanship isn't bad, huh?

22101511.text_en: Dealt heavy damage to the enemy.

22101512.text_cn: 已对目标造成大量伤害。
22101512.text_en: The target has suffered a great deal of damage.

22101513.__title_hint: 敌人重伤/Enemy low on health
22101513.text_cn: 敌人的血条不太好看了。
22101513.text_en: The enemy's health bar doesn't look very good.

22101516.__title_hint: 左侧有敌人/Enemies on the left
22101516.text_en: There are enemies advancing on the left.

22101517.__title_hint: 左侧有敌人/Enemies on the left
22101517.text_en: Attention! There is an enemy on my left!

22101518.__title_hint: 右侧有敌人/Enemies on the right
22101518.text_en: There are enemies on the right.

22101519.__title_hint: 右侧有敌人/Enemies on the right
22101519.text_en: Look, the enemy is on the right!

22101520.text_en: Be careful of what's behind you!

22101291.text_cn: 这里是猎虎，你的代号是什么？
22101291.text_en: This is Tiger. What is your code name?

22101091.text_jp: やっちゃってください!

22101270.text_en: Are you ready? Let's take off!

22101098.text_en: Be careful of the danger zone!
22101098.text_jp: 危険地帯に注意してください!

22101273.text_en: Attention everyone, there is danger here.

22101099.text_jp: この場はお任せください!

22101102.text_en: Be careful, there's a problem here!
22101102.text_jp: ここに注意してください

22101103.__title_hint: 这里可以安装炸弹/Bomb can be planted here
22101103.text_en: Come here to install the bomb.
22101103.text_jp: 爆弾をセットできます!

22101278.__title_hint: 这里可以安装炸弹/Bomb can be planted here

22101279.text_en: Report, bomb location has been identified.

22101105.text_jp: 爆弾がドロップしています

22101106.text_jp: 防具がドロップしました

22101107.text_jp: 戦術アイテムがドロップしました!

22101292.text_en: Partners, we have an enemy on the hook.

22101018.text_cn: 嘿，我的名字叫米雪儿。卡拉彼丘就放心交给我守护吧！我会全力以赴的！
22101018.text_en: Hey, my name is Michele. Leave the protection of Strinova to me! I'll give it my all!
22101018.text_jp: 本官はミシェル・リーです!カラビヤウの秩序を守るために、精一杯頑張ります!

22101019.text_cn: 嘿，如果你需要我，我一定会帮忙的！
22101019.text_en: Hey, if you need me, I'll definitely help!
22101019.text_jp: 困っている人のお役に立てるなら!
